description: Employed Redux for seamless data flow and synchronization, handling complex states like transactions, diagnostics, and authentication.
Reduced AWS monthly service costs by 80% through code refactoring and database indexing.
Created pipelines to establish a CI/CD environment using Lambda and EventBridge for scheduled tasks.
Developed device performance graphs and data visualisations to identify critical errors in heat flow, increasing operational efficiency.
Implemented robust user authentication with support for multiple profiles per account, improving security and usability.
Built reusable React components to dynamically fetch and render content via Statamic CMS, reducing publishing time significantly.
Replaced over 500 lines of hard-coded content by designing logic to dynamically map and display API data.
Used MySQL, PHP, and Axios with NodeJS to manipulate and display JSON data effectively.
Improved testing workflows through Test-Driven Development (TDD) using tools like Lighthouse and Inspector.
Managed Linux VPS with Bash to adjust memory allocation and maintain database integrity during deployment.
Developed responsive frontend blocks using HTML5, CSS3, and Magento 2 CMS.
Improved site load speed through caching, compression, and asset delivery optimization.
Designed and developed a fully responsive site using React Styled Components, CSS Grid, and Flexbox.
Used Kanban methodology to fix bugs and implement improvements, enabling fast-paced CI/CD deployment cycles.
